message:
复制代码保存为.css。
在opera中对bgm.tv或bangumi.tv应用user css，补充opera中漏掉的圆角阴影渐变。

update
2011-03-27 对应v114。新版Opera终于支持css gradients了…
---

@charset "utf-8";
/* Name: Bangumi Opera Fix */
/* 2011-03-29 version 114*/
.power{border-radius:2px;}
ul.edenLine li h2.title{border-top-left-radius:5px;}
div.user_box,div.grp_box,div.eden_box,div.eden_rec_box,
div.eden_list_box,ul#grpCatList ul{border-radius:5px;}
/**/
div#user_home div.userSynchronize{border-radius:5px;box-shadow:0 0 5px #AAA;}
div#user_home div.userSynchronize p.bar{border-radius:10px;}
#entry_list div.item .tags,#viewEntry .tags,div.msgborder,
ul.browserList li.item span.rank,
ul.browserFull li.item span.rank,
#aboutTimeline ul.Events li.intro p,
#aboutTimeline ul.Events li.detail ul.column li,
#aboutTimeline ul.Events li.columnWrapper h3,
#sliderContainer,
input.inputtext,input.side_full,
textarea.quick,textarea.reply,
input.searchInputL,input.searchBtnL,
img.code,div#robot_balloon a.new_notify,#sliderContainer
{border-radius:5px;}
ul.collect_dropmenu{border-radius:5px;box-shadow:2px 2px 5px #EEE;}
#aboutTimeline{border-radius:5px;box-shadow:0 0 5px #DDD;}
div.reply_highlight{border-radius:5px;box-shadow:2 2 5px #DDD;}
.ui-corner-all{border-radius:4px;}
#TB_window{border-radius:5px;box-shadow:0 0 5px #CCC;}
#sliderContainer.sticky{box-shadow:2 2 5px #DDD;}
img.cover{box-shadow:0 1px 5px #AAA;}
a.cover:hover img.cover{box-shadow:0 1px 5px #0187C5}

#columnCrtBrowserA h3,
ul.ajaxSubjectList li.sub_title{background:-o-linear-gradient(top,#FFF,#EAEAEA) !important;}
ul.timelineTabs{background:-o-linear-gradient(top,#FFF,#F2F2F2) !important;}
#columnTimelineInnerA ul.trinav li a.on,
#columnTimelineA ul.trinav li a.on:hover{background:-o-linear-gradient(top,#6BA6D8,#1B6CB5) !important;}
#columnTimelineInnerA ul.trinav li a:hover{background:-o-linear-gradient(top,#FFF,#EEE) !important;}
div.SidePanelMini{background:-o-linear-gradient(top,#FFF,#FBFBFB) !important;}
#prgManagerHeader{background:-o-linear-gradient(top,#FFF,#F1F1F1) !important;}
div#menu ul li a.focus:hover span,div#menu ul li a.top:hover span,#nav_menu li:hover a.top span,
#nav_menu li:hover a.focus span{background:-o-linear-gradient(top,#FAFAFA 20%,#EEE 100%) !important;}
#nav_menu li ul{background:-o-linear-gradient(top,#FEFEFE 80%,#EEE 100% ) !important;}
div#eden_tpc_list ul li:hover{background:-o-linear-gradient(top, #FAFAFA 80%, #EEE 100%) !important;}
input.inputBtn,a.fancyBtn{background:-o-linear-gradient(top,#62C8EC 20%,#319ABF 100%) !important;}
ul.photoPage li a,
ul.photoPage li a.disable:hover{background:-o-linear-gradient(top,#fbfbfb,#f4f4f4) !important;}
ul.photoPage li a:hover{background:-o-linear-gradient(top,#fbfbfb,#ebebeb) !important;}

/* dollars fix */
/*#header,input.tweet {background:-o-linear-gradient(top,#FFF,#CCC);}*/
div:first-of-type[id$="header"],
input.tweet{background:-o-linear-gradient(top,#FFF,#CCC) !important;}
